title: Which technology companies nowadays support remote working (working at home)? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers at Specific Technology Companies

response.answer_text: Most technology companies support and encourage WFH (and will likely continue to do so). Try to get an interview with a company, and wait during the interview to see if the interviewer broaches the topic of WFH. If not, do not bring it up (the company may allow WFH only with a trust relationship after a certain number of months).

Thanks for asking. “Technology companies” is a big category. The list would be hundreds of entries long. Suffice to say I am not aware of any major technology company that doesn’t allow or even require jobs that be done remotely to be done remotely at present.
